parameters.toolDescription: Creates a new customer. Use this when users ask 'create a customer', 'add a new customer', etc. Parameters: name (string, required) - customer name, serviceOrganisationId (string, required) - ID of the service organisation, country (string, required) - country for address, externalId (string, optional), websiteUrl (string, optional), city (string, optional), postalCode (string, optional), street (string, optional), street2 (string, optional), state (string, optional). If user references service org by name, use getAllServiceOrganisations first to find the ID.
parameters.variables: ={{ { "name": $fromAI('name', '', 'string'), "serviceOrganisationId": $fromAI('serviceOrganisationId', '', 'string'), "country": $fromAI('country', '', 'string'), "externalId": $fromAI('externalId', null, 'string'), "websiteUrl": $fromAI('websiteUrl', null, 'string'), "city": $fromAI('city', null, 'string'), "postalCode": $fromAI('postalCode', null, 'string'), "street": $fromAI('street', null, 'string'), "street2": $fromAI('street2', null, 'string'), "state": $fromAI('state', null, 'string') } }}
